| `size`      | `size`       | Predefined spinner sizes.                                                                                  | `"large" \| "medium" \| "small" \| "x-small"` | `'small'`   |
| `theme`     | `theme`      | Adapts the spinner color when used on dark background.                                                     | `"dark" \| "light"`                           | `'light'`   |
